page.title: 15BERROW BEACH
page.content: THE SANDY BEACH AT BERROW IS A SOFT AREA FOR YOUNG AND OLD AND IS A PLACE OF INTEREST FOR PEOPLE WITH VARYING HOBBIES. FOR THE ECOLOGIST THE LOONG WIDE EXPANSE OF BEACH PROVIDES AN AREA SUITED TO THE STUDY OF MARINE LIFE AND OF SEA BIRDS.AS THE TIDE COMES IN,A LARGE VARIETY OF BIRDS CAN BE STUDIED AS THEY SEARCH FOR FOOD. BEACH FISHING IS A PASTIME FOR MANY LOCALS AND FREQUENT COMPITITIONS TAKE PLACE.MOST FISH CAUGHT ARE FLAT FISH.SOME LOCALS CAN BE SEEN PUSHING A TRIANGULAR NET ALONG THE INCOMING TIDE TO CATCH THESE FISH. HORSES ARE EXERCISED ALONG THE BEACH AND,IN WINTER,RIDING STABLES USE THE BEACH TO EXERCISE RACE HORSES.
